title._content: Image taken from page 31 of 'The Eve of the Revolution; in Newcastle-upon-Tyne. (The Case of Sir Henry Brabant, knt., Mayor of Newcastle upon Tyne, most humbly offered to your Majesties Royal consideration.)'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Eve of the Revolution; in Newcastle-upon-Tyne.
